entry.string: If a user successfully authenticates but does not have a login account to Xaraya, the user will not be able to login. By selecting the option below, the user will be automatically added to the Xaraya database and allowed to login.
entry.translation: Iff a user sooccessffoolly oozeenteecetes boot dues nut hefe-a a lugeen eccuoont tu Xereya, zee user veell nut be-a eble-a tu lugeen. By selecteeng zee oopshun beloo, zee user veell be-a ootumeteecelly edded tu zee Xereya detebese-a und ellooed tu lugeen. Bork bork bork!
